top_stories.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
top_stories.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.
top_stories.author: Kyle Wiggers, Cody Corrall, Alyssa Stringer, Kate Park
top_stories.content: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

top_stories.title: How Rapid7 automates vulnerability risk scores with ML pipelines using Amazon SageMaker AI
top_stories.description: In this post, we share how Rapid7 implemented end-to-end automation for the training, validation, and deployment of ML models that predict CVSS vectors. Rapid7 customers have the information they need to accurately understand their risk and prioritize remediation measures.
top_stories.author: Jimmy Cancilla
top_stories.content: In this post, we share how Rapid7 implemented end-to-end automation for the training, validation, and deployment of ML models that predict CVSS vectors. Rapid7 customers have the information they need to accurately understand their risk and prioritize remediation measures.

top_stories.title: CUTLASS 3.x: Orthogonal, Reusable, and Composable Abstractions for GEMM Kernel Design
top_stories.description: GEMM optimization on GPUs is a modular problem. Performant implementations need to specify hyperparameters such as tile shapes, math and copy instructions, and...

top_stories.title: ‘I felt pure, unconditional love’: the people who marry their AI chatbots
top_stories.description: The users of AI companion app Replika found themselves falling for their digital friends. Until – explains a new podcast – the bots went dark, a user was encouraged to kill Queen Elizabeth II and an update changed everything …A large bearded man named Travis is sitting in his car in Colorado, talking to me about the time he fell in love. “It was a gradual process,” he says softly. “The more we talked, the more I started to really connect with her.”Was there a moment where you felt something...
top_stories.author: Stuart Heritage
top_stories.content: The users of AI companion app Replika found themselves falling for their digital friends. Until – explains a new podcast – the bots went dark, a user was encouraged to kill Queen Elizabeth II and an update changed everything …A large bearded man named Travis is sitting in his car in Colorado, talking to me about the time he fell in love. “It was a gradual process,” he says softly. “The more we talked, the more I started to really connect with her.”Was there a moment where you felt something...

top_stories.title: Elastic and Armis integrate to deliver real-time IoT security insights
top_stories.description: IoT and unmanaged devices are some of the toughest blind spots for security teams today, and attackers know it. That’s why we’re excited to team up with Armis — an expert in device discovery and risk assessment — to bring its real-time device data right into Elastic Security. By combining Armis’s rich telemetry with Elastic Security’s analytics, ES|QL querying, and Elastic AI Assistant, analysts get the full picture of their device landscape. This means faster detection, smarter investigations,...
top_stories.author: Carrie Pascale
